amendment.description: An amendment numbered 288 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to provide a $5 million increase to the Family Self Sufficiency Program and reduces funds from the Office of the Secretary at HUD.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pressley amendment (A095) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Pressley amendment (A095) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A095) offered by Ms. Pressley.
